title: Pyramus and Thisbe: or, Love's master-piece. Behold the downfall of two lovers dear, and to their memorys, let fall a tear, a sad mistake their ruine did procure, when as they thought their friendship should endure; oh cruel fate! That cut them off in prime, and for enjoyment, would afford no time. To the tune of, Digby's farewel.
publisher: Printed for W[illiam]. Thackeray, T[homas]. Passenger, and W[illiam]. Whitwood.,
